official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require physicians and others requesting payment on the basis of an assignment under the medicare program to provide a copy of the completed request for payment form to the patient.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require a physician or other person furnishing a service under Medicare who requests payment on the basis of an assignment to furnish a copy of the request for payment to the patient.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require physicians and others requesting payment on the basis of an assignment under the medicare program to provide a copy of the completed request for payment form to the patient.
